title: Kurzgesagt: The Egg
content: A mind-bending animated short story about the nature of the universe and our place in it. It's a beautiful and thought-provoking piece of animation.

title: Vsauce: What is random?
content: An exploration of the concept of randomness and whether true randomness actually exists. Michael Stevens takes you on a fascinating journey through science and philosophy.

title: MKBHD: The State of Foldable Phones
content: A deep dive into the current technology and future potential of foldable smartphones, from one of the most respected tech reviewers on the planet.
